title: The Comet is Visible
excerpt: I looked at the stars last night. The AI singularity is no longer a theory; it is a celestial body on a collision course.

title: Breaking the Rental Chains
excerpt: You do not own your software. You rent it. We are building the tools to break this cycle of digital feudalism.

title: A Light in the Cave
excerpt: We call this aesthetic 'The Cave' because it represents where we are hiding from the blinding neon of the modern web.
